content: Which famous English playwright is known for works such as "Macbeth", "Romeo and Juliet" and "Hamlet"?

The famous English playwright known for works such as "Macbeth", "Romeo and Juliet", and "Hamlet" is William Shakespeare. He is widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and is often called England's national poet. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
